name: Collagen Serum 1oz
description: Achieve a youthful glow with our Collagen Serum. Formulated with Collagen, Retinol and Hyaluronic Acid, this powerhouse of an anti-aging serum is designed to target fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tone and texture. It also helps to strengthen skin with collagen, providing a boost of firmness while locking in moisture for a hydrated complexion. Suitable for all skin types, use nightly after cleansing and toning for maximum efficacy. Let this age-defying elixir work its magic and revel in the revitalized results! Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Polysorbate-20, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Astaxanthin, Fucoxanthin, Chlorella Emersonii Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium PCA, Bisabol, Tocopheryl Acetate, PEG 25 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Fragrance.
